languages.text: {n}Голос губернатора тонет в басовитом рычании бурового мехадендрита. Его острие нацеливается точно в переносицу умолкшего мужчины. Откашлявшись, тот непокорно бурчит:{/n} "Вот какую стратегию переговоров вы выбрали? Думаете, мне в первый раз угрожают оружием?"

{n}The governor's voice dies down in the low growl of a drilling mechadendrite. Its tip is directed straight at the bridge of his nose. Medineh clears his throat and grumbles stubbornly,{/n} "So this is the negotiation technique you have resorted to? Do you think this is the first time I have been threatened with a weapon?"
languages.original_text: {n}Голос губернатора тонет в басовитом рычании бурового мехадендрита. Его острие нацеливается точно в переносицу умолкшего мужчины. Откашлявшись, тот непокорно бурчит:{/n} "Вот какую стратегию переговоров вы выбрали? Думаете, мне в первый раз угрожают оружием?"

Medineh clears his throat and grumbles stubbornly,{/n} "So this is the negotiation technique you have resorted to? Do you think this is the first time I have been threatened with a weapon?"

{n}The governor's voice dies down in the low growl of a drilling mechadendrite. Its tip is directed straight at the bridge of his nose. Medineh clears his throat and grumbles stubbornly,{/n} "So this is the negotiation technique you have resorted to? Do you think this is the first time I have been threatened with a weapon?"

languages.text: {n}Die Stimme des Gouverneurs wird vom tiefen Brummen eines Bohr-Mechadendriten erstickt. Seine Spitze ist direkt auf seinen Nasenrücken gerichtet. Medineh räuspert sich und knurrt verbissen.{/n} "Das ist also die Verhandlungsführung, auf die Ihr Euch verlegt habt? Denkt Ihr etwa, ich werde zum ersten Mal mit einer Waffe bedroht?"
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's voice dies down in the low growl of a drilling mechadendrite. Its tip is directed straight at the bridge of his nose. Medineh clears his throat and grumbles stubbornly,{/n} "So this is the negotiation technique you have resorted to? Do you think this is the first time I have been threatened with a weapon?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Stimme des Gouverneurs wird vom tiefen Brummen eines Bohr-Mechadendriten erstickt. Seine Spitze ist direkt auf seinen Nasenrücken gerichtet. Medineh räuspert sich und knurrt verbissen.{/n} "Das ist also die Verhandlungsführung, auf die Ihr Euch verlegt habt? Denkt Ihr etwa, ich werde zum ersten Mal mit einer Waffe bedroht?

languages.text: {n}Le gouverneur est interrompu par le rugissement sourd de la perceuse d'une mécadendrite. Sa pointe est dirigée droit sur l'arête de son nez. Medineh se racle la gorge et grogne d'une voix entêtée :{/n} « C'est donc la technique de négociation que vous choisissez ? Vous croyez que c'est la première fois qu'on me menace avec une arme ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's voice dies down in the low growl of a drilling mechadendrite. Its tip is directed straight at the bridge of his nose. Medineh clears his throat and grumbles stubbornly,{/n} "So this is the negotiation technique you have resorted to? Do you think this is the first time I have been threatened with a weapon?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le gouverneur est interrompu par le rugissement sourd de la perceuse d'une mécadendrite. Sa pointe est dirigée droit sur l'arête de son nez. Medineh se racle la gorge et grogne d'une voix entêtée :{/n} « C'est donc la technique de négociation que vous choisissez ? Vous croyez que c'est la première fois qu'on me menace avec une arme ? »

languages.text: {n}机械触须发出了低沉的吼声，盖过了总督的声音，尖端直指总督的鼻梁。梅迪涅清了清喉咙，固执地低声说道。{/n}“你就是用这种手段谈判的吗？你以为这是我第一次被人用武器指着鼻子吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's voice dies down in the low growl of a drilling mechadendrite. Its tip is directed straight at the bridge of his nose. Medineh clears his throat and grumbles stubbornly,{/n} "So this is the negotiation technique you have resorted to? Do you think this is the first time I have been threatened with a weapon?"

traits.locale_text: {n}机械触须发出了低沉的吼声，盖过了总督的声音，尖端直指总督的鼻梁。梅迪涅清了清喉咙，固执地低声说道。{/n}“你就是用这种手段谈判的吗？你以为这是我第一次被人用武器指着鼻子吗？”

languages.text: {n}機械触手のドリルの低い唸りの中、総督の声は徐々に弱まった。その先端が彼の鼻筋にまっすぐ向いている。メディネは咳払いをして頑なにボソボソと言う。{/n}「なるほど、これがあなたが取り戻した交渉技術なのですね？私が武器で脅されるのはこれが初めてだとお思いですか？」
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's voice dies down in the low growl of a drilling mechadendrite. Its tip is directed straight at the bridge of his nose. Medineh clears his throat and grumbles stubbornly,{/n} "So this is the negotiation technique you have resorted to? Do you think this is the first time I have been threatened with a weapon?"

traits.locale_text: {n}機械触手のドリルの低い唸りの中、総督の声は徐々に弱まった。その先端が彼の鼻筋にまっすぐ向いている。メディネは咳払いをして頑なにボソボソと言う。{/n}「なるほど、これがあなたが取り戻した交渉技術なのですね？私が武器で脅されるのはこれが初めてだとお思いですか？」

languages.text: {n}El gobernador baja la voz y se escucha el leve rugido de una mecadendrita de perforación. Su punta se dirige directamente al puente de su nariz. Medineh se aclara la garganta y refunfuña con obstinación:{/n} «¿Así que esta es la técnica de negociación a la que recurre? ¿Cree que es la primera vez que me amenazan con un arma?».
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's voice dies down in the low growl of a drilling mechadendrite. Its tip is directed straight at the bridge of his nose. Medineh clears his throat and grumbles stubbornly,{/n} "So this is the negotiation technique you have resorted to? Do you think this is the first time I have been threatened with a weapon?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El gobernador baja la voz y se escucha el leve rugido de una mecadendrita de perforación. Su punta se dirige directamente al puente de su nariz. Medineh se aclara la garganta y refunfuña con obstinación:{/n} «¿Así que esta es la técnica de negociación a la que recurre? ¿Cree que es la primera vez que me amenazan con un arma?».

languages.text: {n}Valinin sesi, delici bir mekadentritin kısık sesli vızıltısıyla kesiliyor. Uzvun ucu doğrudan valinin burnuna bakıyor. Medineh, boğazını temizleyip inatla söyleniyor.{/n} "Başvurduğunuz müzakere tekniği bu demek. Silahla ilk kez mi tehdit edildiğimi sanıyorsunuz?"
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's voice dies down in the low growl of a drilling mechadendrite. Its tip is directed straight at the bridge of his nose. Medineh clears his throat and grumbles stubbornly,{/n} "So this is the negotiation technique you have resorted to? Do you think this is the first time I have been threatened with a weapon?"
